channel.title: CVE Feed for purvabathe -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for purvabathe -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-5342|2024-08-01T21:11:12.441Z -- purvabathe -- simple%20image%20popup%20shortcode
item.description: The Simple Image Popup Shortcode plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'sips_popup' shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 1.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
